name: German Chocolate Pie
author: Suzanne Stull
summary: This is a pie with the flavor of a German Chocolate Cake.
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) bar German sweet chocolate, chopped
directions: In a medium saucepan, combine the 1/3 cup sugar and the cornstarch
Stir in the milk, chocolate, and 1 tablespoon butter or margarine
Cook and stir till thickened and bubbly
Reduce heat; cook and stir 2 minutes more
Gradually stir about 1 cup of mixture into egg yolks
Return mixture to saucepan; bring to boiling
Turn the hot pie filling into the baked pie shell
In another saucepan, combine the beaten egg, evaporated milk, the 1/2 cup sugar, and 1/4 cup butter or margarine
Cook and stir over medium heat just till the mixture is thickened and bubbly
Stir in the coconut and pecans
Spread the pecan mixture evenly over the chocolate filling
Cool the pie on a wire rack;  chill thoroughly
